channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: The light is on at the wrong time, 14th February
item.description:
This is a re-report. It has been the wrong way around for ages. On during the day, and off at night so itâ€™s pitch black of a night
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Redpoll Way, Lessness Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dulwich Antiques Blocking pavement and entrance to mews, 14th February
item.description:
The shop has large items for sale (furniture) all over the pavement and blocking entrance to the private road to Upland Mews. This is at the weekend. It is open into the evening and plays music. During the week they leave items of broken furniture outside the shop and seem to use it to dump items and sometime to repair items on the street. It has been going on for over 6 months but they have expanded to more of the pavement and to even more of the entrance the mews which is hard to access. The mews contains commercial and residential properties that need access at all times, even when main gate is closed. The shop also moves all the bins flats without gardens into the road and blocks that with them.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 13, Upland Road, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Terrible potholes on Peckham Rye, 14th February
item.description:
Following all this wet weather the road erosion has escalated enourmously on Peckham Rye just after East Dulwich Road. Cars are bringing up the debris from the holes onto the pavement, and the size of the holes are so large that when buses pass over, it literally shakes the walls of our building.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 112, Peckham Rye, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothol quit big and getting bigger, 14th February
item.description:
There is a bigger pothole. And it is getting bigger. Especially in this weather. We have fire trucks coming in , ambulances quite a lot to the seniors flat blocks at the end and its getting worse. Also damaging the wheels of cars. Had to change tyre.
